item.title: The Obamas challenge America. And, what led up to Maine's deadliest mass shooting
item.description: The Obamas headlined DNC night two, challenging America to make history by electing the first woman to the White House. And, a final report released on what led to Maine's deadliest mass shooting.

item.title: What does Ukraine’s incursion into Russia say about a so-called 'red line'?
